description:
## The .NET Programmer’s Playground

* [Instantly test](https://www.linqpad.net/#scratchpad) any C#/F#/VB snippet or program
* [Query databases in LINQ](https://www.linqpad.net/#db) (or SQL) — SQL/Azure, Oracle, SQLite, Postgres & MySQL
* Enjoy [rich output formatting](https://www.linqpad.net/#dump), optional autocompletion and integrated debugging
* [Script and automate](https://www.linqpad.net/lprun.aspx) in your favorite .NET language
* Super lightweight — single 20MB executable!
* Standard edition free, with no expiry
author: Joseph Albahari
